title: Roasted squash and pepper salad
description: A lovely warm vegetarian salad with roasted butternut squash and peppers. Substantial enough for a healthy dinner.
ingredients: 130g bag Florette Watercress, Spinach and Rocket salad leaves
Handful of mixed fresh coriander and mint leaves
6 sun-dried tomatoes in olive oil, drained and roughly chopped

method.Step 1: Make the dressing. Put the tomatoes and vinegar in a small pan and heat gently. Set aside for 30 minutes. Blend in a mini processor with the rest of the ingredients until chunky. Add 1 tablespoon warm water. Season.

method.Step 2: Preheat the oven to 200°C/fan180°C/gas 6. Cook the peppers in a roasting tin for 30 minutes.

method.Step 3: Quarter, deseed and peel the squash. Cut into 1cm pieces. Toss with the oil, garlic, chilli and season. Cook in a roasting tin for 20 minutes, until tender.

method.Step 4: Put the peppers in a plastic bag, seal and cool. Remove the stalks, skin and seeds. Slice the flesh.

method.Step 5: Divide the salad leaves and herbs between 4 plates. Scatter with the squash, peppers and two-thirds of the chickpeas. Stir the rest into the dressing. Spoon over the salad and serve.
